Power (Varies, Zone, Fire, Cold, Poison) âœ¦ Encounter (Standard Action)

Effect: You create a zone in a wall 5 within 10 squares of you. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When you use this power, choose one of the following effects (a creature can take damage from the zone only once per turn):

Flame (Fire): Any creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 5 fire damage.

Frost (Cold): Any creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 2 cold damage, and it is slowed (save ends).

Darkness: The zone is heavily obscured.

Venom (Poison): The zone is lightly obscured, and any creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 2 poison damage.

Level 13 or 18: Add 5 to the effect's damage, if any.

Level 23 or 28: Add 10 to the effect's damage, if any.
